name: Navy Combat Mission- Sniper Shoot
description: Get ready for a real attack on a navy ship that is detected in deep sea by our satellite. Navy Combat Mission- Sniper Shoot is the most immersive and realistic 3D battle with horrible environment of helicopter air attack on enemy warships. Be the best sniper shooter and destroy all the naval battleships in enemy fleet in your army helicopter. It's a real gunship battle, air combat to eliminate enemy soldiers on ships in the ocean from your gunship helicopter. Fighter enemy soldiers have navy carrier illegal in our sea boundary. Eliminate all the enemies and get the control of the navy ship carrier. Shoot down the enemies who are about to breach your sea territory from your gunship helicopter.
